document_data.mainbody:
aventree Villa, also known as Raventowers, was the family estate of the Waterdhavian noble house Raventree.
The villa was located at the corner of Sul Street and Chassos Trot in the northeast section of Waterdeeps Sea Ward.
Raventree Villa was composed of several structures reaching two and three storeys in height. The walled estate dominated much of the city block where is was located.
